Wumi Toriola bụ onye Naijiria n'eme ihe nkiri nakwa onye n'emepụta ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Wumi Toriola na Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ gara Providence Primary nakwa Secondary School na Lagos Steeti tupu ọ agaa Mahadum nke Ilorin ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ na Linguistics.
N'afọ 2009, Toriola nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Odunfa Caucus, ma mepụta ihe nkiri mbụ ya akpọrọ Ajewunmi n'afọ 2015.
N'afọ 2018, o nwetara mmeri nke Fastest Rising Actress (Yoruba) na City People Entertainment Awards.
Toriola lụrụ di n'afọ 2018. Ọ mụrụ nwa mbụ ya na 14 Ọktoba 2019.
